Question: Third Reality, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Third Reality, Inc.

Product: Smart Bridge MZ1

- Central component of smart home system
- Bridge between Matter standard and Zigbee protocol
- Enables easy integration of Zigbee devices into Matter system
- Provides one-stop smart home management solution
- Offers customized kits and pre-matching services
- Simple application operation and QR code scanning for effortless setup

At CES 2024, Third Reality, Inc. will showcase a series of smart home devices compatible with the Matter standard, designed to integrate smoothly with numerous smart home products on the market, creating a more interconnected, efficient, and personalized smart living environment. The company is committed to launching products compliant with Matter standards, aiming to provide a smarter and more convenient living experience.
Summary_cn:
第三现实公司

产品：智能桥MZ1

- 智能家居系统的核心组件
- Matter标准和Zigbee协议之间的桥梁
- 实现Zigbee设备轻松集成到Matter系统中
- 提供一站式智能家居管理解决方案
- 提供定制套件和预匹配服务
- 简单的应用操作和扫描二维码轻松设置

在2024年的CES上，第三现实公司将展示一系列与Matter标准兼容的智能家居设备，旨在与市场上众多智能家居产品无缝集成，打造更加互联、高效和个性化的智能生活环境。该公司致力于推出符合Matter标准的产品，旨在提供更智能、更便捷的生活体验。
